title: Aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe Ŋutinya Kpuie le Yamenutome - Orbital Temple
heading: Aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe Ŋutinya Kpuie le Yamenutome
intro: Tso esime woda satelait wɔwɔe ɖe yame dzidzedzetɔe zi gbãtɔ le ƒe 1957 me la, satelait akpe ewo kple edzivɔ va ƒo xlã Anyigba. Le ɣeyiɣi yeye sia me la, nutalawo kpɔ mɔnu aɖe si dzi woato akeke woƒe nuwɔna ɖe enu eye yamenutome va zu avɔ yeye ƒomevi aɖe. Le ema megbe la, nyabiase veviwo do mo ɖa ku ɖe yamenutomeyimɔ̃ didi ƒe dunyahehe ŋu - togbɔ be womekpɔ ƒo nu tso anyigba geɖe wu ŋu haɖe o hã.

leonov.text: Nutata gbãtɔ si wowɔ le yamenutome enye ɣedzeƒe ƒe nɔnɔmetata si Russiatɔ yamenutomeyimɔ̃dzikpɔla Alexei Leonov ta esime wònɔ Voskhod 2 me le ƒe 1965 me .
leonov.caption: Aɖaŋudɔ gbãtɔ si wowɔ le yamenutome, kple pɛnsil siwo Alexei Leonov zã tsɔ tae. Foto: Yuri Gagarin Yamenutomeyilawo ƒe Hehenaƒe ƒe Blemanudzraɖoƒe

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Ƒe etɔ̃ megbe la, Ɣleti Blemanudzraɖoƒe , si nye anyikpe gbadzɛ sue aɖe si wogblɔ be woɖi ɖe Ɣletia dzi si dzi nutala xɔŋkɔ ade siwo nɔ U.S. ɣemaɣi ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔwo le: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers kple Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Ɣleti Blemanudzraɖoƒea ƒe nɔnɔmetata si woɖe tso New York Times ƒe nyati gbãtɔa me. Asibidɛa do viviti ɖe Warhol ƒe nɔnɔmetata la ŋu.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Warhol ƒe nudzɔdzɔ si doa dziku na ame - le miame le etame - na dɔ sia zu kuxi na kadodomɔnuwo ɣemaɣi.
moonMuseum.caption2: Nɔnɔmetata si New York Times tia be yeata, si me nutataawo dze le ete eye Andy Warhol ƒe nɔnɔmetata le miame le etame.

fallenAstronaut.text: Le ƒe 1971 me la , Apollo 15 yamenutomeyimɔ̃dzikpɔla David Scott tsɔ aluminum kpememe sue aɖe si le abe amegbetɔ ene si woyɔna be Fallen Astronaut da ɖe Ɣletia dzi . Belgiumtɔ nutala Paul Van Hoeydonck ɖoe be yeatsɔ nutata sia aɖo ŋku yamenutomeyilawo kple yamenutomeyimɔ̃dzikpɔla siwo ku le yamenutomeyimɔ̃wo didi ƒe ŋgɔyiyi me dzi.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Ŋkuɖodzikpe si wogblẽ ɖe dzinu dzi le Hadley-Apennine ƒe anyidzeƒea ƒe dzedzeme.

pioneerVoyager.text: Le ƒe 1970-awo me la, Pioneer Plaques kple Voyager Probes siaa ɖo mɔnukpɔkpɔ yeyewo ɖi na aɖaŋudɔwo le yamenutome. Esi wotsɔ aluminum-kpe siwo wotsɔ sika wɔe siwo dzi woŋlɔ gbedasi siwo wokpɔna tso Anyigba dzi yi na yamenutomeyimɔ̃ bubu ɖesiaɖe si ate ŋu akpɔe le etsɔme didi aɖe la, woɖe amegbetɔ ƒe agbenɔnɔ fia le eƒe akpa vevitɔwo kekeake me.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 kple 11 ƒe kpetatawo, siwo wotsɔ yi yamenutome goglo le ƒe 1970-awo me.

dove.text: Le ƒe 1990 me la, Brazil gblẽ eƒe dzesi ɖe anyigbamama sia dzi kple DOVE/OSCAR-17 , si nye satelait si me aɖaŋu le si me womezãa aɖaŋu le o si ŋu hakpanya ƒe ŋusẽ gã aɖe le. Togbɔ be ewɔla mebu eɖokui be yenye nutala o hã la, enye hakpanya ƒe agbagbadzedze si de to ŋutɔ: elé ɖeviwo ƒe gbe siwo bia ŋutifafa ɖe mɔ̃ dzi eye wòɖo wo ɖe radio dzi dɔwɔla siwo wu akpe eve le xexeame katã, si trɔ CubeSat si nye mɔɖela wòzu gbeɖiɖidɔ si wowɔ ɖekae.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, Brazil ƒe hakpanyawo ƒe satelait si ɖoa ɖeviwo ƒe gbe ɖe amewo hena ŋutifafa, ƒe 1990.

lastPictures.text: Le ƒe 2012 me la, nutala Trevor Paglen do "The Last Pictures" , si nye micro-etched disc si me foto 100 siwo wotsɔ kpe ɖe Echostar XVI kadodowo ƒe satelait ŋu le anyigba ƒe ɣletinyigba dzi. Wotrɔ asi le eŋu be wòanɔ anyi ƒe biliɔn geɖe, eye woɖoe be wòanɔ anyi didi wu amegbetɔwo ƒe dekɔnuwo abe blematomenukunuwo ene na etsɔme didi aɖe.
lastPictures.caption: Wodze The Last Pictures, si nye disk si dzi woŋlɔ nu suesuesuewo ɖo si wowɔ be wòanɔ anyi didi wu ameƒomea, ɖe ŋgɔ le ƒe 2012 me.

ulises.text: Le ƒe 2015 me la, Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexicotɔwo ƒe Yamenutome Habɔbɔ) do Ulises I , si nye nanosatellite si wosusu be enye susu ƒe opera le nutala Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús ƒe mɔfiafia te. Wotsɔ satelait la yi yame le yamenutome le ʋuƒo dzi le Feria del Libro de Guadalajara ƒe ɣeyiɣia me. Wotrɔ asi le eŋu be wòawó le abe gaƒoƒo ene ene eye wòaɖiɖi to parachute dzi.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, si nye susuŋutinunya ƒe satelait opera si Colectivo Espacial Mexicano wɔ.

artsat.text: Ƒe 2014 me hafi woda satelait gbãtɔ si nye aɖaŋudɔwo dzro ko la ɖe yame. Tokyo Yunivɛsiti ƒe ARTSAT-1 Invader dɔa ɖo teƒe ŋuti nyatakakawo ɖe Anyigba dzi siwo wozã le aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe ɖoɖowɔwɔ kple hadzidziwo wɔwɔ me.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader framework kple spare parts siwo susɔ ɖe Anyigba dzi.
artsat.caption2: mission [SPACE x ART] − beyond Cosmologies ɖeɖefia si wowɔ le Egbegbe Aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe Blemanudzraɖoƒe Tokyo

kac.text: Brazil kple Amerikatɔ egbegbe nutala Eduardo Kac kpe asi ɖe yamenutome nutata ŋu to nuwɔwɔ aduadu kple NASA kple SpaceX me . Eƒe "Ememe Telescope" ( 2017 ), si wòwɔ kple Franse yamenutomeyimɔ̃dzikpɔla Thomas Pesquet , na wowɔ nɔnɔmetata aɖe si wowɔ le Dukɔwo Dome Yamenutome Dɔwɔƒe .
kac.caption: Ememe Telescope le Dukɔwo Dome Yamenutome Dɔwɔƒe, si wowɔ kple Franse yamenutomeyimɔ̃dzikpɔla Thomas Pesquet, ƒe 2017.

enoch.text: Le ƒe 2018 me la, wodze CubeSat si mewɔa naneke o si wotu abe aɖaŋudɔ ene la ɖe ɣletinyigba dzi. Bahamastɔ susuŋutinunyala Tavares Strachan ye to Enoch vɛ, eye sika si ƒe kpekpeme nye karat 24 ƒe nugoe aɖe si me Afrika-Amerikatɔ yamenutomeyimɔ̃dzikpɔla gbãtɔ, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr , ƒe nɔnɔmetata le la le eme.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (nukpɔkpɔ ƒe dɔwɔƒe), 2015-2017. R Tavares Strachan, foto R Blemanudzraɖoƒe ƒe Dɔwɔhatiwo/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Le ƒe ma ke me la, wodo Trevor Paglen ƒe Orbital Reflector hã ɖe ŋgɔ abe kpememe si woda ɖe CubeSat si mewɔa dɔ o me ene. Dɔa nye aɖaŋudɔ si woɖo be wòatrɔ alesi míekpɔa míaƒe nɔƒe le xexeame. Wometsɔe de dɔwɔwɔ me nyuie o. Togbɔ be womeʋui gbeɖe abe alesi wowɔe ene o hã la, ehe dzeɖoɖo veviwo vɛ eye wòhe ɣletiviŋutinunyalawo, dzɔdzɔmeŋutinunyalawo, nyadzɔdzɔgblɔmɔnuwo, nufialawo, sukuviwo, kple amehawo katã ɖo nya ŋu vevie le xexeame godoo, si ɖee fia be mehiã be aɖaŋudɔ si akpɔ dzidzedze nakpɔ dzidzedze le mɔ̃ɖaŋununya me o.
orbitalReflector.caption: Digitál Gɔmeɖeɖe le Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Nutala bubu geɖewo kpe asi ɖe yamenutome ƒe aɖaŋudɔwo ŋu, eye wo dometɔ ɖesiaɖe tsɔ nukpɔsusu tɔxɛwo vɛ le woƒe numekukuwo me. Dɔ ɖedzesiwo dometɔ aɖewoe nye Sarah Jane Pell ƒe yamenutomeyimɔ̃ ŋuti nutala ƒe numekuku si ku ɖe amegbetɔ ƒe dɔwɔwɔ ŋu le nɔnɔme siwo gbɔ eme me; Agnes Meyer-Brandis ƒe Moon Goose Analogue dɔ si dzro ŋutinya kple ɣemaɣi ƒe yamenutomeyimɔ̃ ŋuti nuŋlɔɖiwo me; Nahum ƒe AstroArts ɖoɖo si naa aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe nuheŋusẽ sue dodokpɔwo nɔa bɔbɔe; kple Arthur Woods ƒe Cosmic Dancer ƒe nɔnɔmetata, si nye nɔnɔmetata gbãtɔ si woɖe fia le yamenutome le Mir ʋudzeƒea le ƒe 1993 me.

orbitalTemple.text: Le ƒe 2025 me , le ƒe 4 ƒe numekuku kple ŋgɔyiyi megbe la, Braziltɔ nutala Edson Pavoni kple dɔwɔhatiwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒo aɖe si tso dɔ vovovowo me la adze Orbital Temple , si nye aɖaŋudɔwo ƒe satelait si me wokpɔa gome le si kpea amesiame le xexeame be wòaɖo ŋkɔwo ɖe ɣletinyigba dzi, si awɔ ŋkuɖodzinu si axɔ amewo katã ɖe eme kura le liƒowo godo.
orbitalTemple.caption: Orbital Gbedoxɔ si le Mercosul Bienal. Foto: Clara Marques ƒe foto

imageAlts.leonov: Alexei Leonov ƒe nutata kple pɛnsilwo
imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Moon Museum ceramic wafer si ɖe nutatawo katã fia
imageAlts.fallenAstronaut: Yamenutomeyila si dze anyi ƒe ŋkuɖodzinu le Ɣletia dzi
imageAlts.artsatInvader: ARTSAT-1 Amedzidzela ƒe satelait ƒe wɔwɔme
imageAlts.artsatArt: Nutata siwo wowɔ tso ARTSAT-1 ƒe nyatakakawo me
imageAlts.enoch: Tavares Strachan ƒe ENOCH ƒe nukpɔkpɔ ƒe dɔwɔnu
